ISSUE.TITLE: Emailcollector does not save attachments for tickets
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Emailcollector does not save attachments for tickets ### Dolibarr Version 20.0 ### Environment PHP PHP 8.x ### Environment Database n/a ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior Configure module Emailcollector to receive mails and create tickets Send an email with attachment to the configured address Ticket is created without attachment ### Attached files _No response_
